events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop has a large scratch on the screen and a faulty keyboard. I need assistance.
The reported issue involves a broken and scratched product component, categorizing this case under Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to a technical support agent specialized in hardware issues for further assistance.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch on the screen and the issues you are experiencing with the keyboard?
I have attached several photos showing the scratch on the screen and the keyboard keys that do not respond properly.
Thank you for the information. We can offer to replace the laptop or provide a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to have the laptop replaced rather than a refund. Please proceed with the replacement process.
We have initiated the replacement shipment for your laptop. You will receive tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
We wanted to check that your replacement laptop has arrived and is functioning properly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
